descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
This is a football header and freekick simulator (soccer).
Become a striker who scores headers and freekicks in a realistic football simulator. Experience the thrill of scoring goals as a pro in a big stadium with thousands of fans screaming and bringing victory to your team.

[media]
# CHALLENGING OPPONENTS
The defenders and goalkeepers in this game will try their best to stop you from scoring. You have to quickly assert their positions and decide where to put the ball to maximize scoring chance (as in real life). We have slow-motion options so heading becomes easy for new players.

# REALISTIC BALL PHYSICS
We developed our projectile physics to correctly simulate the ball projectile with drag, Magnus effect, and collision check with your head to ensure a realistic heading experience.
[media]


# FREE-KICK MODE

[media]

# INSTANT-REPLAY

[media]

# COMPETE ON THE LEADERBOARD

[media]
Score as many goals as you can and climb the global leaderboard! Let’s become the world’s top scorer!
display_long_description_unprocessed:
This is a football header and freekick simulator (soccer).
Become a striker who scores headers and freekicks in a realistic football simulator. Experience the thrill of scoring goals as a pro in a big stadium with thousands of fans screaming and bringing victory to your team.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499293690_9566889620078359_6140439055085683802_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=WZrfeqiLQ6wQ7kNvwEhEWbn&_nc_oc=AdlztyOw3GfE5iA4iBUI8s3keIaGbAaoL2GS4N5rNoW-hq2e_-kfBjLYLEwUEZVo_g8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=XO3ZIUJleMI3pXswNlg92g&oh=00_AfrFfbOyJretP8Mi20bU1S-ArjxKzgjo-9EdIfA2FOpYYA&oe=697A6241)
# CHALLENGING OPPONENTS
The defenders and goalkeepers in this game will try their best to stop you from scoring. You have to quickly assert their positions and decide where to put the ball to maximize scoring chance (as in real life). We have slow-motion options so heading becomes easy for new players.

# REALISTIC BALL PHYSICS
We developed our projectile physics to correctly simulate the ball projectile with drag, Magnus effect, and collision check with your head to ensure a realistic heading experience.
